alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Niobrara, northern Goshen, northeastern Platte and east central Converse Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Redbird to 8 miles west of Keeline. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lusk, Glendo, Manville, Sibley Peak, Two Moon Campground, Prairie Center, Keeline, Rawhide Buttes, Glendo Reservoir, Lance Creek, Manning Ranch, Van Tassell and Lost Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 106 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
